name: Easy Pricing Table WP
author: Plugin Wale

sections.description:
A pricing table is a valuable tool for businesses looking to showcase their products or services on a WordPress website. With a variety of design options available, it is easy to create Beautiful, Responsive pricing table that is both informative and visually appealing.

With just a few clicks, you can design tables that are visually stunning and easy for your visitors to understand. Whether you’re a small business owner or a seasoned entrepreneur, a pricing table plugin takes the hassle out of presenting your offerings online, making it simple to attract and convert customers.

Standard Features

  • Responsive Pricing Table
  • Compatible With Elementor Page Builder
  • Fully Responsive.
  • All Browser support.
  • Bootstrap Based
  • 4 Template Designs
  • Features ‘Right’ & ‘Cross’
  • Icon Piker Setings
  • Columns Settings
  • Custom CSS Style
  • Header Color Option
  • Button Color Option
  • Color Unlimited
  • Unlimited Color For Featured
  • Add and Remove Pricing Table
  • Display Pricing Table by Unique Post id
  • Use via short-code.

Demo

Check Free Plugin Demo – Click Here
sections.installation:
Download & Upload:

  1. Download the Easy Pricing Table plugin (.zip file)
  2. In your admin area, go to the Plugins menu and click on Add New
  3. Click on Upload Plugin and choose the easy-pricing-table.zip file and click on Install Now
  4. Activate the plugin and Enjoy!

Manually:

  1. Download and upload the Easy Pricing Table plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is Easy Pricing Table free?

Yes, Easy Pricing Table is a free plugin.

Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.
